StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetFacilityByMccCode]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MccCode varchar(50) AS
SELECT DISTINCT RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.ISOPEN, RO.NAME, RO.SHORT_NAME, RO.MCC_CODE, RO.STREET, RO.STREET2, RO.CITY, RO.STATE_CODE, RO.ZIP_CODE, RO.MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, CONVERT(varchar(11), RO.EFFECTIVE_DATE, 13) EFFECTIVE_DATE, RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE, RO.DateClosed, RO.USER_LOGIN, OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.CITY_CODE, RO.COUNTY_CODE, RO.STATE_GEO_CODE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM on (RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID) WHERE RO.MCC_CODE = @MccCode
